import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { BookDataService } from 'src/app/Services/book-data.service'; import { Book } from 'src/app/interfaces/book'; @Component({ selector: 'app-show-book', templateUrl: './show-book.component.html', styleUrls: ['./show-book.component.css'], }) export class ShowBookComponent { // Creating a public property of type Book and initializing it to an empty object. public book: Book = {} as Book; constructor(private service: BookDataService, private route: ActivatedRoute) { // The id in this.route.snapshot.params.id is the same as the id in the path in app.module.ts for 'show-book/:id' this.service .getBookById(this.route.snapshot.params.id) .subscribe((data) => { this.book = data; }); } }
